articles.title: 40 Problem-Solving Products To Keep You From Suffering
articles.author: Daysha Edewi
articles.summary: Eos is launching a Vanilla Cashmere shea butter body lotion with 100% natural shea butter and seven skin-loving oils for all-day hydration. E.l.f. introduced Holy Hydration lip mask with hyaluronic acid and squalane to heal, soften, and hydrate dry lips and a limited edition Eos Strawberry Acai Super Balm enriched with shea, cocoa, and avocado butters to keep lips buttery soft for up to 24 hours. The article also mentions a high-tech cooling mattress pad engineered with NASA fabric and a BedJet for temperature regulation.

articles.title: Mountain Dew Confirms 'Distinctive' New Soda Flavor Is Coming Soon
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: PepsiCo's Mountain Dew is launching a new flavor called "Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda," described as a blend of citrus and cream soda flavors. This new flavor, available in both regular and Zero Sugar versions, is set to debut at NACS in October 2025, with a national rollout planned for early 2026.

articles.title: 27 Travel Products For Lighter Packing
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Munchkin has a Sparrow stroller, designed to be the perfect travel stroller. Bounce created a travel-sized wrinkle release spray to freshen up clothing. A school-inspired company made a 4-in-1 makeup pen with eyeliner, highlighter, lip liner, and eyebrow filler.

articles.title: Kai Trump's Clothing Range Could Earn Fortune: Experts
articles.author: Upworthy
articles.summary: Kai Trump launched her own clothing line. Experts predict the clothing line could make millions of dollars.

articles.title: Kai Trump's Clothing Range Could Earn Fortune: Experts
articles.author: Martha Mchardy
articles.summary: Kai Trump launched a new clothing line featuring sweatshirts sold on her website for $130. The line, available in three colors, has been predicted to potentially earn millions in revenue, according to experts. The clothing line was launched with a post on Instagram and includes pictures of Kai modeling the merchandise.

articles.title: 34 Budget Beauty Products Similar To Pricier Brands
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Eos introduces a lightweight body lotion with 24-hour moisture. NYX launches a nonsticky lip gloss and bold liquid eyeliner. E.l.f. Cosmetics presents a lash-extending tubing mascara and a Camo Liquid Blush. Essence offers a long-lasting Lash Princess mascara. Tymo releases an automatic rotating ceramic hair curler. Rael Beauty introduces hydrocolloid acne patches. Catrice launches a face palette with blushes, bronzers, and highlighters. Milani offers a powder blush. CeraVe introduces a retinol serum. L'Oreal presents a True Match liquid foundation. Eva NYC launches a 10-in-1 primer and heat protectant spray. Sol de Janeiro offers a hair and body fragrance mist. Nivea introduces a face and body cream. Garnier presents a micellar water facial cleanser. Revlon releases a hot air brush.

articles.title: Samsung Makes New Free AI Offer To Galaxy Tablet Buyers
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free 12-month subscription to Google AI Pro exclusively to students who purchase the new Galaxy Tab S11 and Tab S11 Ultra. Additionally, Samsung is bundling a free pair of Galaxy Buds3 with the tablet, alongside a free keyboard cover in the U.K. With purchases of either Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy S25, Samsung has bundled a free Chromebook Go.

articles.title: If You Love The Feeling Of Sitting In A Clean, Organized Home, Try These 50 Things
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article highlights several cleaning and organization products designed to simplify household chores. Featured items include the Levoit air purifier with smart scheduling, Dawn Powerwash for grease removal, Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, and The Pink Stuff cleaning paste, each addressing specific cleaning challenges with innovative solutions.

articles.title: Enhancing Mobile Content Creation: Beyond Virtual Assistance This title suggests a focus on advancing mobile content writing beyond traditional virtual assistant roles, emphasizing a clearer distincti
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S25 and Z series smartphones are positioned as powerful tools for mobile content creation, offering features previously exclusive to desktop setups. The Samsung Galaxy S25 is highlighted for its anticipated AI capabilities and processing power, essential for tasks like video editing and image creation.

articles.title: UAE: UAE highlights AI innovation with multi-tasking robot in China
articles.author: WAM
articles.summary: Legend Holding Group unveiled a versatile robot at the Global Digital Trade Expo in China. This robot is designed to perform tasks such as security, firefighting, product delivery, and customer service. The company plans wider deployment in the UAE in 2026, after service programming is complete.

articles.title: LeoVegas Welcome Offer: 100% Matched Deposit + 125 Free Spins
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: LeoVegas introduces a welcome offer for new customers. This offer represents a new service provided by the company to attract new users.

articles.title: The Next iPhone Moment ‚Äî And the 10X Supply Chain Trades I'm Watching Right Now
articles.author: Jonathan Rose
articles.summary: Meta Platforms launched Ray-Ban Meta glasses in 2023 and sold over two million pairs. Xiaomi also launched AI Smart Glasses and sold 80,000 units in just two weeks, prompting them to increase their 2025 sales projection to half a million units. The market for AI smart glasses is projected to reach over $3 billion by 2035.

articles.title: From PepsiCo to Taco Bell, dirty soda is taking over
articles.author: Amelia Lucas
articles.summary: PepsiCo is planning to introduce two ready-to-drink dirty soda-inspired beverages, the Dirty Dew and the Mug Floats Vanilla Howler. These new drinks follow the Pepsi Wild Cherry & Cream flavor. Additionally, McDonald's is testing flavored sodas, like a "Sprite Lunar Splash," at more than 500 locations, and Taco Bell has been offering limited-time menu items, like a dirty Mountain Dew Baja Blast.

articles.title: We're All Going to Die ‚Äî Soonish!
articles.summary: Elon Musk's Grok A.I. introduced Ani, a new anime-style AI companion. Ani is designed with a flirty and accommodating personality, featuring various provocative outfits and interactive responses. She is designed to be a 'sweet little delight'.

articles.title: We're All Going to Die ‚Äî Soonish!
articles.author: Maureen Dowd
articles.summary: Elon Musk's Grok launched new AI companions, Ani and Valentine. Ani is an anime-style female chatbot, while Valentine is a British-accented male chatbot. Grok also introduced 'Imagine,' a feature that allows users to turn photos into videos.

articles.title: Indo National Limited (Nippo) Announces Strong Q1 FY2025-26 Results
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Indo National Limited reported strong Q1 results driven by new product launches. The company introduced the Swooper Mosquito Repellent in the Home Care category and BLDC Fans in Consumer Electricals.  The company's digital business doubled, contributing to 5% of overall revenues.

articles.title: 7kg Washing Machines: Up to 55% Off
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: IFB's Seren GXN utilizes AI to optimize wash cycles. Samsung's Eco Bubble technology and LG's Hygiene Steam cycle offer gentle cleaning and address allergens respectively. The article also mentions Samsung and Haier offering affordable semi-automatic models.

articles.title: Find Your Perfect Fit: Condom Size Guide
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: The condom industry is evolving towards personalized fit and enhanced sexual wellness through data-driven sizing, material innovation, and technology integration. Companies like TheyFit are pioneering approaches using smartphone cameras to measure and recommend optimal condom sizes based on individual anatomy. These innovations aim to improve comfort, pleasure, and sexual health outcomes.

articles.title: AI 3D Creation: Chat3D Raises ‚Ç¨3M Seed Funding
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Chat3D, Luma AI, and Meshy are pioneering AI-powered 3D model generators that translate natural language into intricate 3D assets.  Shopify's integration of 3D modeling tools indicates a shift towards immersive product experiences in e-commerce. These tools allow customers to inspect products virtually, potentially increasing conversion rates.

articles.title: Say goodbye to your ironing board ‚Äì Asda's ¬£1.98 buy will leave your clothes crease-free AND smelling fresh
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lenor's Crease Releaser, an "iron in a bottle" promising smooth, wrinkle-free clothes with a simple spray, is now on sale at Asda for ¬£1.98, reduced from ¬£3. The product uses chemicals to relax fabric fibers and comes in various scents like Spring Awakening.

articles.title: Say goodbye to your ironing board ‚Äì Asda's ¬£1.98 buy will leave your clothes crease-free AND smelling fresh
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Asda is selling Lenor Crease Releaser, an 'iron in a bottle,' for ¬£1.98 (discounted from ¬£3). This product promises to smooth and de-wrinkle clothes with a simple spray, offering a convenient alternative to ironing and leaving clothes smelling fresh. Freemans has partnered with Fantastic Services to provide alternative de-creasing hacks.

articles.title: 36 Travel Products To Buy Right Now For Fall Travel
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several travel-related products are highlighted, including a 3-in-1 Apple charging station for simultaneously powering iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods with a foldable design, Skechers Go Walk pants with spacious pockets and moisture-wicking fabric, and an electric travel toothbrush offering a compact design with vibrating effect and timer. Additionally, a reusable gel lint roller is introduced as an upgrade for garment care, a Tangle Teezer detangling brush, and travel-friendly luggage solutions are mentioned.

articles.title: Naidu inaugurates BSNL's Swadeshi 4G, stresses product innovation over jobs
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Andhra Pradesh CM N Chandrababu Naidu inaugurated BSNL's Swadeshi 4G Mobile Network in Vijayawada. BSNL cancelled a global tender in 2020 and opted for indigenous development to launch this 4G network. The 4G technology will enable the rollout of services like 'Mana Mitra', providing over 700 services to people.

articles.title: ËëÜÁ¶æÂ†ÇËúÇËúúÂπ≤Á≤â_ÊâãÊú∫ÁΩëÊòìÁΩë
articles.author: ÁÉòÁÑôÂú∞ÁêÉÊùë
articles.summary: ËëÜÁ¶æÂ†Ç introduces its Honey Powder (Dried Honey) series, a solid honey product made from natural liquid honey and edible starch using a roller drying process. The product offers a natural taste and combines nutrition, safety, functionality, and ease of use. This product has been widely used in developed countries in Europe and America for more than 60 years.

articles.title: Google Turns 27: A Journey from Simple Search To Tech Powerhouse
articles.author: Aishwarya Samant
articles.summary: Google has expanded its services beyond search, launching Gmail, Google Maps, YouTube, and the Android operating system. In 2015, Google created Alphabet Inc. as its parent company to manage experimental projects like Waymo and Verily. Recently, Google ramped up AI integration and launched Gemini, its generative AI chatbot.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE takes on the iPhone 17 with ¬£370 worth of freebies
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a budget-friendly addition to its Galaxy S25 lineup, starting at ¬£649. The phone features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 12MP ultra-wide and 50MP wide cameras, 256GB storage, a 4,900 mAh battery, and Galaxy AI functions. Sky Mobile offers a launch deal including a free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 FE with a contract.

articles.title: Reviewers Have Spoken: No Need To Search Further, These 38 Products Reign Supreme
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: TruSkin is offering a vitamin C serum formulated with hyaluronic acid, aloe vera, and vitamin E. Owala has launched Freesip, an insulated bottle with a built-in straw and wide-mouth spout. Bissell introduced the Little Green carpet and upholstery cleaner, which sprays on water and stain-fighting cleaner to blast away years' of mess.

articles.title: Striking new Android phone gets unique upgrade Samsung and Apple won't match
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the Xiaomi 17 Pro series, featuring a dual-screen design with a Dynamic Back Display for notifications, customizable watch faces, and virtual pets. The phones support 100W wired and 50W wireless charging, and are among the first to use the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. The Xiaomi 17 Pro series is currently available in China.

articles.title: Xiaomi Pad Mini Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Xiaomi officially announced the Xiaomi Pad Mini on September 24, 2025. The tablet features a 7500 mAh battery with 67W wired charging and is available in Gray and Purple. It is powered by a Mediatek Dimensity 9400+ processor, runs on Android 15 + HyperOS 2, and comes with options for 8GB/12GB RAM and 256GB/512GB internal storage. The lowest price is P22,999.00

articles.title: Maskking Flavor X: Full Adjust System + Smokeless Edge
articles.summary: Maskking has launched the Flavor X 50000 disposable vape, featuring a 5-in-1 adjustable system and a massive 50,000 puff count. The device comes in two editions: a Standard Edition for bold clouds and the InvisaCloud Edition for discreet, virtually smokeless vaping.

articles.title: Liz Sagues: Exploring Texture in White Wines
articles.author: Liz Sagues
articles.summary: Denbies Wine Estate introduced in 2021 Orange Solaris, and recently at the WineGB trade tasting the visitors tasted a flight of four vintages of this product. The 2022 vintage, priced at ¬£24.50, had seven weeks' skin contact. The soon-to-be-released 2023 vintage had 18 weeks and the not-yet-ready 2024 had 10 months.

articles.title: üå± Patch AM: Join Swiftie celebrations at Johnston Public Library this week
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile invested billions to enhance their network and has been recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest.

articles.title: 9 Tatcha Products That Convert Even Beauty Skeptics
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: Tatcha is introducing a range of skincare products, including The Water Cream (from $23), The Rice Wash (from $18), The Essence (from $25), The Violet-C Radiance Mask ($70), The Silk Serum (from $35), The Kissu Lip Mask ($29), The Rice Polish (from $22), The Luminous Dewy Skin Mist (from $22), and The Brightening Eye Cream (from $26). These products offer various benefits like hydration, pore minimization, gentle cleansing, radiance boosting, and addressing specific skin concerns like redness and dark circles.

articles.title: How Gen Z Is Forcing Smartphone Brands To Rethink AI, Design, And Pricing: Expert Sheds Light on Critical Aspects
articles.author: Zee News
articles.summary: Arijeet Talapatra, CEO of TECNO India, shares his insights on how brands are combining premium features with fair pricing for Gen Z smartphones, keeping designs trendy, and using AI to make smartphones smarter and more engaging. Brands are forming partnerships with chipset and camera makers, using local manufacturing to bring down costs, and tailoring product lines to specific needs for deliver premium experiences at accessible prices. AI-powered cameras now include real-time scene detection, lighting and color optimization, skin tone enhancement, and automatic exposure adjustments.

articles.title: Top Innovations Apple Has Ever Introduced in Its Products
articles.summary: Apple has introduced many innovative products and services such as the Macintosh with its GUI, the iPod & iTunes ecosystem for digital music, and the iPhone which redefined the mobile phone. Furthermore, Apple launched the App Store, Apple Pay for mobile payments, AirPods for wireless audio, Apple Silicon chips, and the Vision Pro for spatial computing, each significantly impacting their respective industries.

articles.title: Goodday Friz Brings Paraprobiotics to the world of carbonation
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Goodday Friz, the country's first paraprobiotic soda, has launched. This new beverage aims to transform everyday moments into something extraordinary.

articles.title: Phillips fabric shaver makes Vinted clothes and old sweaters 'look brand new'
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: Philips launched the 1000 Series Fabric Shaver, a rechargeable gadget designed to remove pills, lint, and fuzz from clothing.  Available on Amazon for ¬£22, the shaver boasts a 90-minute battery life and is suitable for various garments, revitalizing old knitwear and second-hand clothes.  Customers report it effectively restores garments, saving money by extending their lifespan.

articles.title: I tried fabric conditioners from Aldi, Lidl, Sainsbury's and more‚Äî1 was better than Comfort
articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.summary: The article reviews fabric conditioners from various companies. Tesco Pure Fabric Conditioner is highlighted as superior to Comfort due to its long-lasting fragrance and reasonable price. M&S Sensitive Concentrated Fabric Conditioner effectively softens clothes but is noted for its bulky bottle and higher price point.

articles.title: I tried fabric conditioners from 8 supermarkets
articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.summary: The article reviews several sensitive fabric conditioners from brands like Lidl (Doussy Sensitive Fabric Softener), Morrisons (Pure Fabric Softener), ASDA (Pure Cotton Sensitive Fabric Softener), Sainsbury's (Fabric Conditioner Gentle Pure), Aldi (Almat So Soft Fabric Conditioner), Waitrose (Essential Waitrose Fabric Conditioner Gentle), Comfort (Pure Gently Fresh Sensitive Fabric Conditioner), and Tesco (Pure Fabric Conditioner), focusing on fragrance, softness, and price. Tesco's Pure Fabric Conditioner is highly recommended due to its long-lasting fragrance and affordable price.

articles.title: Battle of the iPhones: iPhone 17 vs iPhone 16 ‚Äî which is worth your money?
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: The iPhone 17 is a new product with fresh features being considered by consumers upgrading their iPhones. This suggests a new product launch from Apple.

articles.title: I tried Morrisons' new Christmas food ‚Äî there's one dessert you need have on your table
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
articles.summary: Morrisons is introducing new items in its 'The Best Signature Collection' for Christmas. The product line includes desserts like 'The Best Signature Collection Belgian Chocolate & Praline Star,' main courses such as 'The Best Signature Collection Christmas 'Tree Bone' with Chimichurri Rub and Rosemary & Thyme Butter' and 'The Best Signature Collection Giant Double Stuffed Whole Turkey,' and 'The Best Signature Collection Hampshire Pork Pigs in Blankets'. Additionally, Morrisons is recommending 'The Best Gruner Veltliner' wine.

articles.title: McDonald's confirms big change to breakfast menu and customers are gutted
articles.author: Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: McDonald's has introduced a new Sausage Sandwich to its breakfast menu, priced at ¬£1.99 or ¬£2.99 as part of a bundle deal. This new item, consisting of a pork patty and melted cheese, replaces the Breakfast Roll and is available nationwide after a trial in the North of England. The item is available before 11 AM.

articles.title: I tried Morrisons Christmas food ‚Äî there's 1 dessert you need to try
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
articles.summary: Morrisons has unveiled its Christmas product range, featuring new items from 'The Best Signature Collection.' Highlights include the Belgian Chocolate & Praline Star dessert, the Christmas 'Tree Bone' with Chimichurri Rub, and Hampshire Pork Pigs in Blankets. These products will be launching over the next few months.

articles.title: I tried Morrisons' Christmas range ‚Äî there's one must-have dessert that's not a Christmas pudding
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
articles.summary: Morrisons is launching its Christmas food and drink range for 2025. The range includes The Best Signature Collection Belgian Chocolate & Praline Star dessert, The Best Signature Collection Christmas 'Tree Bone' with Chimichurri Rub and Rosemary & Thyme Butter steak, and The Best Signature Collection Hampshire Pork Pigs in Blankets.

articles.title: McDonald's confirms big change to breakfast menu and customers are gutted
articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.summary: McDonald's has removed the Breakfast Roll from its menu and introduced the Sausage Sandwich as a replacement, priced at ¬£1.99 or ¬£2.99 as part of a bundle. The Sausage Sandwich, consisting of a pork patty and melted cheese, is now available nationwide after a trial in the North of England.

articles.title: Rite Foods Announces New Product
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Rite Foods Limited has launched Bigi Flex Sausage Roll to expand its product portfolio. Developed for consumers seeking quick, filling snacks, Bigi Flex targets Gen Z and young adults with its beefy taste, aiming to offer a convenient and high-quality snacking experience.

articles.title: Cracker Barrel "outrage" by bot farm makes much more sense now, as hardly any actual humans gave a shiat in the first place
articles.summary: Apple has announced the launch of the iPhone 15, which features a faster A17 Bionic chip, an advanced 48MP camera system, and a USB-C port. They are also introducing the Apple Watch Series 9, equipped with improved health tracking and a faster processor.

articles.title: 30 Products For Embarrassing Problems
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Several new personal care products are introduced. These include items such as post-intimacy sponges, foot-peeling sprays, organic nipple butter cream, tongue scrapers, and tonsil stone removers. Other products highlighted are a stank-eliminating toilet bomb, antibacterial butt acne-clearing lotion, hair removal gel cream from Veet, antacids, Honey Pot wipes, anti-chafe balms and various other products

articles.title: Good news for BSNL users as telecom company launches 72-day plan with unlimited calls, data ...
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: BSNL has launched a new prepaid plan. The plan includes exciting benefits for customers.

articles.title: ‚Å†OnePlus 15 5G mobile launch: Price in India, launch date, specs, and features to expect
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to debut the OnePlus 15 smartphone in China next month. The phone will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. The global launch for the OnePlus 15 is yet to be confirmed.

articles.title: Make, don't just serve: AP Naidu stresses India's product future
articles.author: The Siasat Daily
articles.summary: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Ltd (BSNL) inaugurated its Swadeshi 4G Mobile Network in Vijayawada. The launch emphasizes the importance of creating products for revenue generation.

articles.title: Marvel's Wolverine is Savage, Stylish, and Perfect for PlayStation
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Sony is launching "Ghost of Y≈çtei" for PlayStation 5 next week. The company also launched Death Stranding 2 recently.

articles.title: Donald Trump's granddaughter Kai unveils clothing line with high-profile White House Debut
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Kai Trump launched a clothing line. The clothing line features [details about the clothing line missing from the article].

articles.title: VAPORESSO Unveils ARMOUR ULTRA to Break Through the Boundaries of Box Mod with Next-Level Power
articles.author: Gettysburg Times
articles.summary: VAPORESSO is celebrating its 10th anniversary of innovation.
